scanBagScreen.title: scan a bag
scanBagScreen.subtitle: Line up the label inside the frame.
scanBagScreen.captureError: We couldn't read the text. Try again.
scanBagScreen.permissionBody: Allow camera access to scan your coffee bag.

coffeeRoast.title: What roast is it?
coffeeRoast.popupDescription:
**Let's** figure it out together!
**Here's** the 3 types of coffee roast available

dose.title: How much coffee in?
dose.popupNoScaleMessage: **Without** a scale it will be very difficult to ensure consistency or precise adjustments, so it's recommended to purchase a scale.

extractionDuration.title: Extraction duration
extractionDuration.popupNoTimerMessage:
**Without** knowing the extraction time, it will be very difficult to offer accurate tips.
**Try** using your phone. Start a stopwatch when you start the extraction.
extractionDuration.beginnerHint: If no coffee is extracted till 10s. it means the shot choked due to a too fine grind size. Think like sand, if too fine, water takes a long time to pass through. Try increasing the grind size and brew another shot

tasteFeedback.title: How did it taste?
tasteFeedback.bitterDescription: burnt toast, green banana peel, dark IPA
tasteFeedback.wateryDescription: lacks sirup aspect, no powerful taste
tasteFeedback.noCoffeeExtractedDescription: Well...hard to describe the absence of something

diagnoseSuccess.title: Your new recipe
diagnoseSuccess.subtitle: Recipe summary
diagnoseSuccess.description: Save your latest dial-in so you can repeat it anytime. You can find it in Recipe Agenda.
